entry.title: $2452 // **Designed to allow you to focus on living your life with a home**
entry.content:
ID
21534

Introducing 115 Stanwix, your sanctuary away from the day to day grind. Designed to allow you to focus on living your life with a home automation system, you can preprogram temperatures based on the time and day of the week. Turn the lights off and adjusting the thermostat sitting on on your couch or laying in bed. Building includes co-working space with conference rooms, gym, library, screening room a ground floor mail room, indoor lounge, Banquette lounge, Rooftop lounge and garden.

Exposed Brick

Hardwood Floors
